title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1153.6 - Atomic weapons
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1153.6 - Atomic weapons

State Regulations

No person shall, at any time, store, keep, handle, use or
transport at, in or upon a terminal any weapon of war employing atomic fission
or radioactive force. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1153.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
